name: Legends of Temple Tower
description:
Use your trusty whip and the temple's mysterious mechanisms to move levels and explore the temple! Uncover all of the Temple Tower's secrets as you dodge traps, outrun boulders and wrestle pumas!

Featuring:
-  Puzzle Action Platforming!
- 5 deep and content filled  levels!
- Pumas to wrestle!
- Boulders to outrun!
- Treasures to collect in each level!

Important Note: Game is best played with a controller!!! Game uses button prompts for mechanism usage and fights and currently do not have keyboard button prompts. Team is working on getting the keyboard graphics in soon!
